textBeforeTable: Publications 7 Trivia 6.1 Isamu's Party 6 Character summary 5 Gym Battles 4.2 Evolutions 4.1 Additions 4 Party changes 3 Important events 2 Chapters 1 Publications Contents Volume 4 is the fourth volume of the Pokémon Pocket Monsters manga created by 穴久保幸作 Kosaku Anakubo. Pokémon Pocket Monsters Manga series PM023 - PM030 Chapters included Info 250px Pokémon Pocket Monsters volume 4
textAfterTable: Chapters Clefairy Evolves... At Last?! The Pokémon Quiz Battle!! Defeat the Most Formidable Pokémon!! Clefairy's Christmas Present?! Whose Curry is the Most Delicious? Dream of 1 Million Yen!! Havoc at the Amusement Park!! Let's Enjoy the New Year!! Important events Red has a curry cooking competition with Green. Red has a baseball match with Green. Party changes Additions The following Pokémon are obtained: Evolutions The following Pokémon evolve: Red's Clefairy evolves into Clefable in PM023. Red's Pikachu evolves into Raichu in PM023. Gym Battles Red defeats the following Gym Leaders: Character summary Isamu's Party ↔ Clefairy ↔ Clefable ↔ Pikachu ↔ Raichu
